current_task: Fix still not working - browser shows old code
message: URGENT: The fix is NOT deployed! Browser console still shows 'parameters[offset]' in URLs. The container is serving old cached JavaScript. Need FULL rebuild with cache clear.

action_required.why: Next.js caches built JavaScript. The old buggy client.ts is still being served. Need --no-cache build.

verification.check_source: Look at line 35 of src/lib/apple-music/client.ts - should be: { limit, offset }
